author: _shemnon
content: Is there any interest in a formal or informal precompile registry, outside of the mainnet hardfork set?  Enterprise Ethereum Alliance has had non-standard precompile adresses for years now, but we are starting to see L2 solutions that use a precompile for what amount to system calls.  Also, chains like Celo have already activated the BLS-12 precompiles on their chain.  This may be a critical mass to make it matter.

author: _shemnon
content: Something along the line of the rfc1340 well known port numbers and/or chainid.network

author: atoulme
content: +1 for such a registry. We can also have a genesis file field for precompiles or to reserve ranges explicitly for enterprise deployments.
